definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: First-generation cell phones were basic analog units, based on a scheme that Alexander Graham Bell would recognize.
sentences.chinese: 第一代手机技术是基本模拟信号，是基于贝尔的理论。

sentences.english: In computer technology, the larger the number of bits, the more exact analog signals.
sentences.chinese: 之中，比特数越高表示模拟信号就越精确。

sentences.english: The voltage of the analog signals in control and protection circuits are all below DC 24V.
sentences.chinese: 控制和保护回路模拟信号的电压都低于24V直流。

sentences.english: The first essential step in analog-to-digital conversion is to sample an analog signal.
sentences.chinese: 模数转换关键性的第一步是对模拟信号进行采样。

sentences.english: It is used for temperature measurement instruments and system that is an analogue signal output.
sentences.chinese: 用于需要有模拟信号输出的温度测量仪表和系统。

sentences.english: A device that senses and stores the instantaneous value of an analog signal.
sentences.chinese: 一种检测和存储模拟信号瞬时值的设备。

sentences.english: The analog signals must be converted to voltage signals suitable for conversion to digital form.
sentences.chinese: 模拟信号须转换成适合于变换到数字形式的电压信号。

sentences.english: Sampling time for all digital and analog signals is 10 msec .
sentences.chinese: 采样时间为所有数字和模拟信号是10毫秒。

sentences.english: The analog signals of ultrasonic fault detector are digitalized successfully.
sentences.chinese: 成功地将超声探伤仪输出的模拟信号数字化。

sentences.english: TV broadcasts here are still being done in analogue.
sentences.chinese: 这里的电视广播依然使用的是模拟信号。

sentences.english: Two light sources are used for simulating the signal and backscatter light respectively.
sentences.chinese: 采用两个模拟光源，分别模拟信号光和后向散射光。

sentences.english: Well, the first two letters represent the basic analogue signal.
sentences.chinese: 好的，前两个字母的抽像形式代表基础模拟信号。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
